relation: Caith Skin for Tidy Plates: Th...
pageTitle: Tidy Plates : Unit Mods : World of Warcraft AddOns
textBeforeTable: Optional Files (11) See Changelog.txt for the complete WALL OF TEXT! * re-added health bar color function * Rename of "Beta Grey" to "Standard Grey" - Check! * Clean Up Files - Check! Release Tidy Plates 5.9 Release Notes - .hitbox.width width of hitbox (default: 149) - .hitbox.height height of hitbox (default: 37) * '.hitbox' has been added, as a style category. This will alter the clickable region, out-of-combat * Undo the frame separation (Allows Virtual Plates to run) * Changed default fonts from Arial to Liberation (halves the file size, woo!) 5.9.1 * added .flags to name, level, specialText, and specialText2 - used for adding outlines to your text... if you REALLY want them. *shudder* * added .secureframe pointer to .extended, pointing to the base frame * TidyPlates:ForceUpdate() does not allow targetting a specific frame, anymore. Use: TidyPlates:ForceUpdateFrame(frame), instead * level text will not show when skull icon is active * frames faded too much (more than 50%); problem fixed * removed some old code related to the frame separation "feature" *shudder* 5.9.2 * painted my nails * casting progress now
